BasicInfo.short: eZdia offers a content creation platform that enables e-commerce companies to attract visitors, engage customers, and boost revenue.

Products.name: eZdia CCP (Content Creation Platform) is now CrewMachine
Products.description: eZdia's CCP allows customers, agencies, individual creatives and networks to collaborate on all types of of content marketing projects.

news.title: CrewMachine is All Set to Disrupt the Enterprise Content Creation and Enrichment Market as a Simple Platform to Manage Complex Content
